title: EPAM Systems | Senior Data Scientist (A3) | Hyderabad
content:

title: Microsoft L64 Offer
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 15 years
Prior Experience: Service-based and Startups
Current CTC: 60L(All fixed)
Date of the Offer: May End
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SSE AI/ML - L64
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: 65L
Signing Bonus: 10L + 3L
Relocation : 3.5L
RSU: $110K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: Upto 30% of base, considering 15% ~ 9.7L
Benefits: Standard MS benefits

Can you guys please help me in evaluating the offer and confirm if i have been low eye balled over here?
